body.title: TICKET COUNTER HOURS
body.text:
Monday-Friday

Opens at least 60 minutes before first departure

Saturday

Opens 90 minutes before first departure

Sunday

Opens 120 minutes before first departure

body.title: TSA
body.heading: Check current TSA wait times
body.text: Don't forget your boarding pass or security documents, and a valid government-issued ID - the Transportation Security Administration (TSA) will need them at the security checkpoints.

body.title: AIRPORT DETAILS
body.text:
Service Animal Relief Area: Located on the lower level, outside baggage claim, approximately 50 feet past the last set of doors near the Southwest Baggage Service Office

Learn more about Louisville International Airport
